localChanges: Add a main menu with a background image.
Update maps to add `clear` method to empty.
Update `City` view to properly show map and worked tiles.

log: Move out the calculation of start tiles to a `Worker` to help prevent locking the main thread.
Include `reconstitueData` as a core lib to be used in other packages.
Add `Entity` and `EntityInstance` types for use in other packages.
Add utilities to help when map data is used elsewhere.
Update `BaseGenerator` to use updated `Generator` interface and utilise `Promise`s for `#generate`.
